attributes.action: Deny visas to diplomats' spouses from countries that ignore Same Sex marriage.
attributes.additional_details: Why should Ambassadors enjoy a freedom they deny others?
attributes.background:
Many UK citizens have got married to non-Europeans/Brits under British same sex 'marriage'. 

When they return to these countries, the document and marriage is void- yet - it the same institution and certificate as a heterosexual marriage.
